Words

How to play

Click on the letters to form words. Words must be at least 3 letters long and must be in the dictionary. Find as many words as you can before time runs out. Good luck!

Custom Game

Enter a board and a time limit to create a custom game. The board must be 16 letters long, each row is seperated by a period, and the time limit must be a number between 1 and 10.
